self.name: chatAdminRights
self.description: Represents the rights of an admin in a channel/supergroup.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Represents the rights of an admin in a channel/supergroup.

arguments.name: changeInfo
arguments.description: If set, allows the admin to modify the description of the channel/supergroup

arguments.name: postMessages
arguments.description: If set, allows the admin to post messages in the channel

arguments.name: editMessages
arguments.description: If set, allows the admin to also edit messages from other admins in the channel

arguments.name: deleteMessages
arguments.description: If set, allows the admin to also delete messages from other admins in the channel

arguments.name: banUsers
arguments.description: If set, allows the admin to ban users from the channel/supergroup

arguments.name: inviteUsers
arguments.description: If set, allows the admin to invite users in the channel/supergroup

arguments.name: pinMessages
arguments.description: If set, allows the admin to pin messages in the channel/supergroup

arguments.name: addAdmins
arguments.description: If set, allows the admin to add other admins with the same (or more limited) permissions in the channel/supergroup

parent.name: ChatAdminRights
parent.description: Represents the rights of an admin in a channel/supergroup.
